19799e06-72c1-419e-8ca1-2b783cce3d43.message: Hello Jane, I wanted to update you on my mental health diagnosis. I have been diagnosed with major depressive disorder since February 2023. Additionally, I was diagnosed with generalized anxiety disorder in December 2022. My recent assessment indicated that my depression symptoms have moderately worsened. Please let me know if you need any more information or if there's anything specific we should discuss.
